GSP32paddhs_u:547: na samyogaḥ sambhavati tasya guṇatvena dravyāśritatvāt /
GSP32paddhs_u:548: nāpi samavāyas tasyaikatvāt na cānyā vṛttir astīti / na / tādātmyāt /
GSP32paddhs_u:549: yathā dravyaguṇakarmaṇām sadātmakasya bhāvasya nānyaḥ sattāyogo 'sti /
GSP32paddhs_u:550: evam avibhāgino vṛttyātmakasya samavāyasya nānyā vṛttir asti tasmāt svātmavṛttiḥ /
GSP32paddhs_u:551: [Pdhs_12_326 2] ata evātīndriyaḥ sattādīnām iva pratyakṣeṣu vṛttyabhāvāt svātmagatasaṃvedanābhāvāc ca /
GSP32paddhs_u:555: cakre vaiśeṣikam śāstram tasmai kaṇabhuje namaḥ //
